The prices are in Euros, so here is today's exchange rate: 1 Euro equals 1.14 US Dollar.

We are **Virtono**.com and sell both Managed([shared](https://www.virtono.com/website-hosting), [reseller](https://www.virtono.com/reseller-hosting) and [dedicated ](https://www.virtono.com/dedicated-hosting)) and Unmanaged([vps](https://www.virtono.com/linux-vps), [cloud vm](https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vm) and [dedicated ](https://www.virtono.com/dedicated-instances)) cloud hosting services.

Since our founding in 2014, we happily served thousand of clients from all over the world and we continually searched new ways to deliver on our mission: High Quality at Fair Prices. We are now very proud that we discovered and adjusted the right combination between qualitative and affordable web hosting solutions.

We built our team around colleagues with valuable experience in web hosting, virtualization, cloud infrastructure and customer support. Our management has over 15 years of executive experience in Romanian's top telecom companies. 



We operate 5 Cloud Locations : Bucharest, RO - Manchester, UK - The Hague, NL - Frankfurt, DE - Miami(FL), US.

Top features for our new Cloud infrastructure includes:

1. Raid protected SSD storage( & clustered filesystem)
2. Fast Network - Each node is connected to multiple 10Gb networks
3. Internal IPs - your vps can now "talk" with another vps or virtual machine from the same datacenter through a private network.
4. SSH Keys  - are installed with just a few clicks from our cloud panel.
5. Instant Activation - Your virtual server will be automatically provisioned after payment.
6. Custom ISO - you  can upload your own iso and install OS via VNC on [cloud virtual machines](https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vm) and [dedicated instances](https://www.virtono.com/dedicated-instances).

You can manage , get multiple ips, setup rdns or upgrade your server directly from client area.



**The payment methods are**: PayPal, Skrill(CreditCard/Alipay), Bitpay(BTC,BCC), CoinGate(BTC,LTC, ETH and all altcoins), Wechat Pay, Bank Wire Transfer.
